apps.title: Bakio Surf
apps.description: Gamified mobile application currently being developed for a real surf school in Bakio (Spain). The app transforms surf and bodyboard lessons into a retro-style progression system with avatars, levels, challenges and rewards, helping students stay motivated while allowing instructors to track progression in a playful and engaging way inspired by classic video games.

apps.title: DeepFocus
apps.description: Productivity-focused iOS app that combines a task manager, a Pomodoro timer and a visual progress dashboard to improve focus and concentration.
